padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1583631">Scentropolis</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-26">05/26/24 08:32</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Can be worn anytime of year and day or night. Its a constant compliment getter from men whenever I wear it. That being said this does NOT last on the skin. Maybe 2/3 hours. Clothing sure itll last 6/7 hours. The orchid and rose come through strong and I dont get much patchouli tbh. Good thing because I hate most patchouli scents. Summer maybe pushing it a bit for this but its a good office scent and not offensive. Extremely feminine.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="1460"comment_id="2168322"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Viktor-Rolf/Flowerbomb-1460.html?ccid=2168322#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2163030" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2162835" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Stoicchild"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1416393"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1416393.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Stoicchild" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Davidoff/Cool-Water-Reborn-For-Her-Eau-de-Parfum-Intense-95268.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.95268.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Cool Water Reborn For Her Eau de Parfum Intense"title="Cool Water Reborn For Her Eau de Parfum Intense"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2162835ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2162835" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1416393">Stoicchild</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-21">05/21/24 02:15</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A beautiful Vanilla Orchid &amp; Orange Blossom scent. I personally couldn't smell anything else. It's a nice simplistic scent. You don't need to think much before reaching out for it. <br />
<br />
It's very lovely and feminine.<br />
<br />
I didn't get much Patchouli as people have mentioned, which is a good thing. Too much Patchouli on the dry down would make it same as Mademoiselle. I'm not a huge fan of the Chanel DNA.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="1460"comment_id="2162835"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Viktor-Rolf/Flowerbomb-1460.html?ccid=2162835#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2162152" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2162152" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="outro"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1808595"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="outro" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Bath-Body-Works/Pink-Paradise-93222.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.93222.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Pink Paradise"title="Pink Paradise"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2162152ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2162152" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1808595">outro</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-20">05/20/24 11:20</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This smelled beautiful on the test strip. I was nervous that it might be too floral for me, but I found that the notes worked very well together. Even my mom loved it and she hates floral scents. Unfortunately, on my skin, none of the beauty could be found lol. It was a powder BOMB on me.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="1460"comment_id="2162152"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Viktor-Rolf/Flowerbomb-1460.html?ccid=2162152#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2160466" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2160466" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ArtConcierge"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2101170"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2101170.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="ArtConcierge" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/DS-Durga/Debaser-29736.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.29736.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Debaser"title="Debaser"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2160466ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2160466" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2101170">ArtConcierge</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-18">05/18/24 17:24</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>As another reviewer mentioned, there is a very prominent licorice/anise scent in the opening.<br />
It fades quick enough, but licorice is to ArtConcierge, what garlic is to vampires. It's my "F! NO" note. <br />
Otherwise, a very pretty designer that I was delighted to pass on to my cousin.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="1460"comment_id="2160466"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Viktor-Rolf/Flowerbomb-1460.html?ccid=2160466#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2160403" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2160403" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Filolek3037"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1571518"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1571518.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Filolek3037" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2160403ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2160403" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1571518">Filolek3037</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-18">05/18/24 16:03</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Reminds me of coco mademoiselle without the citrusy-sparkling opening</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="1460"comment_id="2160403"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Viktor-Rolf/Flowerbomb-1460.html?ccid=2160403#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2158862" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2158862" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ekie"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2134434"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="ekie" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2158862ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2158862" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2134434">ekie</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-17">05/17/24 05:23</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>My mom's more than 2 year old bottle. The liquid is orange instead of pink now. But it still smells nice.<br />
On first spray it's very strong. I could smell the bergamot, which had a sort of alcohol-ish tinge.<br />
One hour in it's not as strong. I sprayed it on my wrists, and I can't smell it unless I put it up to my nose. But when I do the smell is still fragrant. The alcohol smell has faded and while bergamot is still mostly what I'm getting, the florals are becoming more prominent.<br />
Three hours in it's definitely faded a lot. Most of the top notes are gone and it smells distinctly of florals.<br />
More than 8 hours in and I can smell the base notes very well. Vanilla is the strongest. <br />
Overall feminine standard perfume. It's not exactly what I want to smell like but it smells good. Longevity is great, lasted far longer than I expected for one spray rubbed on both wrists. Sillage was intimate, but I imagine it might be stronger if I had sprayed more on different places.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="1460"comment_id="2158862"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Viktor-Rolf/Flowerbomb-1460.html?ccid=2158862#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2158854" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2158854" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Luilind"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1805463"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1805463.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Luilind" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/M-Micallef/Note-Vanillee-Nectar-78628.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.78628.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Note Vanille Nectar"title="Note Vanille Nectar"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2158854ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2158854" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1805463">Luilind</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-17">05/17/24 05:13</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Femine florals, rose is most prominent in the opening, then the florals blend into a bouquet in the drydown. Its got a fresh vibe without being cucumbery or citrusy. The tea and patchouli completes the bouquet, its not too sweet, not too screechy or indolic, not too earthy - just perfectly balanced.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2145275" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Izzyvogel"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2120519"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Izzyvogel" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2145275ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2145275" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2120519">Izzyvogel</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-04">05/04/24 04:51</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Very good scent for layering. Love how it sits on my skin.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="1460"comment_id="2145275"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Viktor-Rolf/Flowerbomb-1460.html?ccid=2145275#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2144763" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2144763" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Aeternitas"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/603"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.603.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Aeternitas" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Hanae-Mori/Magical-Moon-1578.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.1578.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Magical Moon"title="Magical Moon"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2144763ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2144763" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/603">Aeternitas</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-03">05/03/24 14:33</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I first experienced this fragrance in my late teens, like 2007-ish. I loved it back then, of course. It was a hyper-sweet aphrodisiac to me, and it walked a fine line between girly-girl and woman. Now it's overplayed, like sugar-beast Angel that came before it - everyone wore it. But I still appreciate it. Flowerbomb is iconic in its own right. <br />
<br />
In all honesty, I can't differentiate the notes from the sweetness. The tea note gently shines through, but otherwise it's liquid floral sugar and should have been named Sugarbomb, lol. <br />
Overall it's pleasant and beautiful, with big projection and average longevity.<br />
<br />
La Vie est Belle shares a very similar DNA. If you own one, you don't need the other (unless you just like collecting, of course.)</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="1460"comment_id="2144763"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Viktor-Rolf/Flowerbomb-1460.html?ccid=2144763#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2141899" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2141899" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="hsulewai"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1381740"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1381740.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="hsulewai" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2141899ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2141899" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1381740">hsulewai</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-01">05/01/24 02:34</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I got a 5ml splash bottle sample. I can't detect the tea and bergamot at all. Smells more gourmand than floral too. Just a lot lot of vanilla which was nice to layer with other scents to soften them. But maybe I got a bad sample.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="1460"comment_id="2141899"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Viktor-Rolf/Flowerbomb-1460.html?ccid=2141899#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2137962" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2137962" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="KristinaAlexis"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2111820"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="KristinaAlexis" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Bond-No-9/Chinatown-1300.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.1300.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Chinatown"title="Chinatown"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2137962ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2137962" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2111820">KristinaAlexis</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-27">04/27/24 08:34</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A modern masterpiece. I wore this years ago as my signature fragrance which I switched to La VIe Est Belle another fragrance I love but have moved on from. There is a prounounced tea note that is particularly enjoyable and smooth that I tend to crave every now and again. I will always love Flowerbomb, its a youthful beauty a woman can enjoy at any age.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="1460"comment_id="2137962"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Viktor-Rolf/Flowerbomb-1460.html?ccid=2137962#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2137882" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2137882" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="bblanka"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2073235"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2073235.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="bblanka" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2137882ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2137882" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2073235">bblanka</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-27">04/27/24 06:56</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>nausea causing white floral scent. not well balanced at all , way too clogging.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="1460"comment_id="2137882"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Viktor-Rolf/Flowerbomb-1460.html?ccid=2137882#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2137760" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2137760" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="c453y"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2086915"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="c453y" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2137760ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2137760" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2086915">c453y</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-27">04/27/24 03:07</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This was gifted to me and initially I didn't like it, as I thought it was too sweet. I decided to give it another chance after a year, because it was the only perfume I had left. Now the bottle is almost finished and I'm considering buying it for myself this time. <br />
If you want a classic feminine and sexy scent that is not suffocating, then this is it.<br />
However, I have to say that it doesn't last very long. In the first 2-3 hours I can smell it just fine, but after that it fades away pretty quickly. In my experience, the projection is intimate to maybe moderate and sillage is almost non-existent, but that is to my liking. <br />
So far, I've gotten one compliment by a friend who said I smelled really nice after we hugged. My grandma is usually annoyed by perfume, but when I sprayed this, she said the room smelled like actual flowers.<br />
Overall, it's a yes from me and I'd go as far as to say it's a safe blind buy.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="1460"comment_id="2137760"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Viktor-Rolf/Flowerbomb-1460.html?ccid=2137760#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2133064" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2133064" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="heliotrope317"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1900683"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1900683.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="heliotrope317" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Guerlain/Samsara-Eau-de-Toilette-67534.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.67534.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Samsara Eau de Toilette"title="Samsara Eau de Toilette"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2133064ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2133064" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1900683">heliotrope317</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-22">04/22/24 16:02</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Shhh, this is one of my most favorite scents as though it were made for me. It blends into glory on my skin so much so that I have bought 4 bottles so far.  Now that has never happened before and some can't even believe that it's Flowerbomb that I am wearing.  I receive compliments on it wherever I go, people getting close to me to sniff for no reason. Dark spicey, creamy smooth, not too sweet, from the open of the sambac jasmine and rose down to the holding of the patchouli and vanilla end.  Until I find my ultimate creamy sandalwood dream perfume, this one will stay close to my heart.  This is not a sweet lipstick scent, rather it is pure spicey delish scent that haunts.  I think that everyone has magical perfume notes that are special for them and I hope that you one day find yours.  Oh I will buy this one again, and again, and again, and again.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="1460"comment_id="2133064"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Viktor-Rolf/Flowerbomb-1460.html?ccid=2133064#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2128557" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2128557" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="radicaleah"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/148600"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.148600.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="radicaleah" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2128557ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2128557" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/148600">radicaleah</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-18">04/18/24 11:24</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It took me a long time to try Flowerbomb. I was hesitant due to the notes and due to its popularity. But one day, my husband surprised me and gifted this to me. He said out of all the perfumes he smelled at the store, he loves this one the most. So I decided to give it a try... and WOW. I know it's a classic, and some people call it basic, but this perfume is GORGEOUS. <br />
<br />
Everything is blended so well. It smells sophisticated and it's almost addicting. I get pretty good longevity out of it too (around 4-6 hours), and I carry a travel size with me to refresh with because I love smelling it that much. Love love love.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="1460"comment_id="2128557"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Viktor-Rolf/Flowerbomb-1460.html?ccid=2128557#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2127138" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2127138" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="8bunk"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1904730"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="8bunk" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2127138ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2127138" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1904730">8bunk</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-17">04/17/24 03:15</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This was the second perfume given to me by my momma. Fell in love with it. Definitely not flower based, on my skin it's warm patchouli, and very sweet. But not in a sugary way, so I suppose the florals are somewhere in there. Definitely important to try it on your skin, on some people it smells off. I can see why it's so popular it's cozy and inviting, as well as feminine. On clothes it lasts for weeks (smell gets less potent over time), on me it lasts for a full day and settles into a skin scent at night.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="1460"comment_id="2127138"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Viktor-Rolf/Flowerbomb-1460.html?ccid=2127138#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2123612" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2123612" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="alexisx"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1057491"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1057491.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="alexisx" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Animale/Animale-5919.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.5919.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Animale"title="Animale"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2123612ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2123612" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1057491">alexisx</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-13">04/13/24 10:26</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A shower of citrus fruits that in the long run mixes with an earthy scent that emerges as time passes. Then some unspecified flowers arrive. The scent remains fresh, sour, suitable for spring even if it could be at its best in summer. It has a certain simplicity that makes it suitable for all noses, but this is not a strong point. It's bland, no bomb here, it remains light but enveloping and engaging. It has that aspect of a sparkling, jovial and youthful perfume, without exaggeration, without praise and without infamy, short sillage and longevity. Move on without regrets</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="1460"comment_id="2123612"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Viktor-Rolf/Flowerbomb-1460.html?ccid=2123612#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2123569" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2123569" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Vnp322"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1567489"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1567489.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Vnp322" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Victoria-s-Secret/Tease-Eau-de-Parfum-2020-64012.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.64012.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Tease Eau de Parfum 2020"title="Tease Eau de Parfum 2020"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2123569ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2123569" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1567489">Vnp322</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-13">04/13/24 09:30</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This smells soooooo good! A beautiful gourmand flower ! It's so strong though, which I love, but it can be a bit headache inducing but as long as you spray very little you'll be cool. This laaaaaast, the sillage is so good on this too! I can see why this is loved!! A absolute love for me &lt;3333333</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="1460"comment_id="2123569"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Viktor-Rolf/Flowerbomb-1460.html?ccid=2123569#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2122313" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1974710">Zeddyteddy</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-07">04/07/24 01:17</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I like flowerbomb a lot but its missing good sillage.  I also feel it is overpriced because it just does not last on me - or perhaps I am anosmic to this scent. I bypassed this for a long time and didnt know what it smelt like, therefore I havent experienced the hype of smelling it everywhere on other people. I am not sure how it smells on others, or if it lasts on them. It is an easy reach day time scent for me. I enjoy but there are other fragrances Id rather spend that amount of cash on, especially ones I dont need to top up on.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="1460"comment_id="2116897"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Viktor-Rolf/Flowerbomb-1460.html?ccid=2116897#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2116110" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2111662" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="summervanilla"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1691326"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="summervanilla" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Bath-Body-Works/Pumpkin-Cupcake-75154.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.75154.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Pumpkin Cupcake"title="Pumpkin Cupcake"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2111662ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2111662" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1691326">summervanilla</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-02">04/02/24 06:47</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I did not like this scent for a really long time. I don't even remember why and what my impression of it was. I smelled it when I wasn't very knowledgeable about fragrance, then avoided it as I learned more because I thought I disliked it. I tried it once or twice and it didn't agree with my body chemistry and my nose at all. It gave me a headache and didn't smell nice on my skin. But I still had the sample, and I have been trying to use up all my samples, so I gave it another try. I don't know why, but suddenly I kind of like it. It smells really sweet on my skin. I would agree with everybody who says it isn't very floral. It's like flowers drenched in honey and covered in sugar. I get the similarities with La Vie Est Belle, but they aren't quite the same. Maybe Flowerbomb is her sister, I can't say who is older and more mature. I realize now that I have a few random, cheap perfumes that are dupes or clones of Flowerbomb. While I find I suddenly like this fragrance, I do like the dupes I have better for one reason or another. This would probably be a safe blind buy despite my experience. It would make a really good first fragrance for a young lady or anybody who is interested in sweet, feminine leaning fragrances.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="1460"comment_id="2111662"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Viktor-Rolf/Flowerbomb-1460.html?ccid=2111662#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2110677" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2110677" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Ruthmarie0"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1428296"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1428296.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Ruthmarie0" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Viktor-Rolf/Flowerbomb-1460.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.1460.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Flowerbomb"title="Flowerbomb"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2110677ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2110677" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1428296">Ruthmarie0</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-01">04/01/24 08:27</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Flowerbomb, una fragancia delicada y femenina, ideal para ambientes cerrados como oficinas o reuniones familiares. Notas frescas de flores blancas y un toque clido de vainilla. </p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="1460"comment_id="2110677"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Viktor-Rolf/Flowerbomb-1460.html?ccid=2110677#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2106247" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2106247" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="laviegourmand"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2057960"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="laviegourmand" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2106247ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2106247" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2057960">laviegourmand</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-27">03/27/24 16:26</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Meh. Not sure I get the hype on this one. It's a beautiful floral, but there are so many excellent quality dupes out there I don't think it's worth it at full price. I keep it around because my husband loves it, and I don't dislike it, but it's not my favorite and I wouldn't get another once I use up my current mini bottle.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; Always have, always will. There's a reason this is so well loved, it is a timeless classic. Exquisite. A true masterpiece.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="1460"comment_id="2105296"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Viktor-Rolf/Flowerbomb-1460.html?ccid=2105296#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2101225" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2101225" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="SmellGood_Chi"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1999067"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="SmellGood_Chi" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Yves-Saint-Laurent/Paris-94.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.94.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Paris"title="Paris"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2101225ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2101225" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1999067">SmellGood_Chi</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-22">03/22/24 20:28</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I really wanted to love Flowerbomb...and I just don't. It's a dud. Reeks of old lady in St. John. That is to say, it's classy but dated. The floral descends into something reminiscent of bug spray on me. Is it the tea? The bergamot? The freesia? I don't know but it just doesn't work. Even in trying to layer it with other fragrances it just does nothing for me. Deeply underwhelming and not a compliment-getter. I bought it in a flash sale from Macy's so I'm very glad I didn't spend a lot of money on it but I've spent a few months spritzing her and I just can't. I'm interested in trying some of the flankers to see if they're any better but this OG version is really stale and boring.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="1460"comment_id="2101225"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Viktor-Rolf/Flowerbomb-1460.html?ccid=2101225#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2098401" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2098401" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="velvetmist80"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1481739"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1481739.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="velvetmist80" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Montblanc/Signature-60962.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.60962.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Signature"title="Signature"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2098401ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2098401" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1481739">velvetmist80</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-20">03/20/24 10:16</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I first smelled it on my friend, Perla, and it was absolutely intoxicating ; I HAD to buy a bottle!! Well, on initial spray, the air was filled with an explosion of fresh and sweet notes that had me swooning.  The opulent bouquet was soooo good!  However, on MY skin, it started to take a turn.  It became way too musky for my liking, and the patchouli + my body chemistry didn't mix well.  Straight from the bottle, it smells absolutely fantastic!  But on ME, it veers towards dirty and gross.  So, while Flowerbomb might not be my personal cup of tea, I can definitely see why it has its devoted fans. On certain people, it's a fragrance that demands attention and leaves a lasting impression!  Just make sure you test it on your own skin before committing! </p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="1460"comment_id="2098401"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Viktor-Rolf/Flowerbomb-1460.html?ccid=2098401#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2096705" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
