padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1570068">perfumejunkie77</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-24">12/24/23 14:40</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Worst. Scent. Ever.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="1460"comment_id="2009732"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Viktor-Rolf/Flowerbomb-1460.html?ccid=2009732#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2009724" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2009724" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="annafaerie"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1504463"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1504463.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="annafaerie" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2009724ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2009724" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1504463">annafaerie</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-24">12/24/23 14:15</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>My glamourous mother's signature scent. I dare not wear it yet. I may be biased but I don't think anybody can pull it off quite like she does. <br />
<br />
This really is a flower bomb, it fills the air with floral prettiness. I think it is neither especially youthful or especially mature, it's very timeless and elegant. I think Anya Taylor-Joy was a great pick for the ad campaign. The warm spicy notes twinkle and dance on top of the florals.<br />
<br />
It's heavy, too. It seems to last forever. When my mother leaves the house, the bathroom still smells like Flowerbomb. It's quite a pleasant way to fill the space.<br />
<br />
I imagine: ballerinas sipping champagne after a great opening night, Grace Kelly in pale pink satin, an evening stroll in the garden, and Cinderella's ball.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="1460"comment_id="2009724"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Viktor-Rolf/Flowerbomb-1460.html?ccid=2009724#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2007571" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2007571" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="mayvray"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1797175"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1797175.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="mayvray" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Clean/Skin-35244.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.35244.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Skin"title="Skin"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2007571ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2007571" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1797175">mayvray</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-21">12/21/23 21:59</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A classic!! Florally, patchouli goodness. I bought this for a friends birthday. Smells so pretty.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="1460"comment_id="2007571"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Viktor-Rolf/Flowerbomb-1460.html?ccid=2007571#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2005938" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2005938" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="NillaSugar"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1848473"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="NillaSugar" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Chloe/Nomade-Naturelle-Eau-de-Parfum-71597.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.71597.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Nomade Naturelle Eau de Parfum"title="Nomade Naturelle Eau de Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2005938ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2005938" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1848473">NillaSugar</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-20">12/20/23 04:45</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Oh, I do love Flowerbomb. Its a feminine, sweet and fresh floral with a little hint of vanilla later on. <br />
Ive been wearing this consistently for the last 10 years. I never get bored of it and its one of those rare scents that suits all occasions and seasons. <br />
<br />
I dont think its an explosion of floral like the name suggests though, its obviously floral but has a freshness to it.<br />
I love the fresh green tea, orange, freesia and patchouli. <br />
Its a very well composed perfume that lasts all day on me ( even longer on clothes) <br />
<br />
I dont care that its over popular (although, I hardly smell it in anyone nowadays)  <br />
A good perfume is a good perfume<br />
<br />
Its also the scent Im guaranteed to get compliments on, my sister bought a bottle after smelling it on me &amp; my mum is always saying oooo you smell nice when she hugs me &amp; im wearing this.<br />
<br />
I cant say I fully get the LVEB comparison. <br />
LVEB smells sweeter to me, I really like it but prefer Flowerbomb.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="1460"comment_id="2005938"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Viktor-Rolf/Flowerbomb-1460.html?ccid=2005938#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2005009" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2005009" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="marietangerine"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1463786"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1463786.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="marietangerine" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Mugler/Angel-Muse-36416.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.36416.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Angel Muse"title="Angel Muse"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2005009ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2005009" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1463786">marietangerine</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-19">12/19/23 02:43</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is a classic. I remember buying it when it originally came out and thought it was a bit spicy and mature for me, I think the patchouli and rose were much stronger. Now I really like it. The floral vanilla sweetness and green tea combo make this seem like an extroverted cousin to Kilian Princess (way more floral of course). I dont think you can go wrong with this, its very feminine, seductive, although maybe not for high heat. I find it to have strong projection and moderate longevity.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="1460"comment_id="2005009"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Viktor-Rolf/Flowerbomb-1460.html?ccid=2005009#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2003703" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2003703" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="UlianaM"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1910998"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1910998.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="UlianaM" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Mancera/Tonka-Cola-76893.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.76893.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Tonka Cola"title="Tonka Cola"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2003703ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2003703" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1910998">UlianaM</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-17">12/17/23 13:11</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Nice pleasant flower scent. It smells young.<br />
Not special, not unique, more a trendy one, but well-made.<br />
Good sillage, not killing. <br />
I am actually surprised this so much better than the rest of the its l'oreal sisters.<br />
I'd say if you're looking for something flowery, a little sweet, but fresh scent, that could be a blind buy (though I don't recommend blind purchases; if you can test in  store before buying, better do it).Way better than My Way Armani.<br />
But as somebody mentioned in the comments, if you're looking for something more mature, this is not it. This is an infant one :)</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="1460"comment_id="2003703"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Viktor-Rolf/Flowerbomb-1460.html?ccid=2003703#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2002924" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2002420" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="La Vie en Luxe"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1773755"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1773755.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="La Vie en Luxe" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Kayali-Fragrances/Vanilla-28-52616.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.52616.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Vanilla 28"title="Vanilla 28"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2002420ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2002420" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1773755">La Vie en Luxe</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-15">12/15/23 23:49</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I was very pleasantly surprised by this one. Just as the name suggests, it is a lovely floral scent with a sweetness attached. I can see the similarities to La Vie est Belle that others mention and it performs similarly on me - I got quite a few hours out of it and definitely good sillage which I rarely get. I do feel like I have come across a few others wearing this so this might not be for you if you're looking for something unique and "different" but I personally will definitely invest in a bottle. It's also a nice one to layer with other scents if you want to put your own twist on it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="1460"comment_id="2002420"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Viktor-Rolf/Flowerbomb-1460.html?ccid=2002420#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2001366" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2001366" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="warmcashmere"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1879178"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1879178.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="warmcashmere" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2001366ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2001366" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1879178">warmcashmere</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-14">12/14/23 14:54</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I put Flowerbomb on for the first time in 10 years (new decant, not an old bottle) and it smelled slightly different to me. There was a sharpness to it that verged on headache territory. It was too late to change fragrances completely (this is a strong one!), so I decided to layer it with a vanilla. I mixed it with Caramelo Vanilla and that made it more tolerable. It was fun to wear for a day and earned me a compliment, but I think I'm going to forgo a full bottle.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="1460"comment_id="2001366"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Viktor-Rolf/Flowerbomb-1460.html?ccid=2001366#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1999821" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1999821" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ambervxyjul"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1598318"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1598318.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="ambervxyjul" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1999821ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1999821" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1598318">ambervxyjul</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-12">12/12/23 20:08</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Timeless fragrance imo. Has all the right florals, a great balance of sweetness and comforting base of pachouli and vanilla. Wear whatever you like, but sometimes certain fragrances can target certain groups of people. Flowerbomb is weird to me because I cant pinpoint what age can wear this. I feel its suited for anyone! A great gift buy. Reminds me of la vie est belle but a tad bit sweeter!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="1460"comment_id="1999821"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Viktor-Rolf/Flowerbomb-1460.html?ccid=1999821#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1999443" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1999443" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="QueOndaGuera"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1827142"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1827142.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="QueOndaGuera" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Kerosene/Sweetly-Known-64644.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.64644.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Sweetly Known"title="Sweetly Known"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1999443ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1999443" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1827142">QueOndaGuera</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-12">12/12/23 11:22</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Flower bomb is pretty and classic. Typically these are not the notes I go for in fragrancespatchouli tends to be earthy and damp on me while florals just arent my favorite. The combination of notes with the tea note is beautiful together. It definitely is on the lower end of moderate lasting power though. I sprayed myself before heading out the door and now its coming up lunch time and I can hardly detect it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="1460"comment_id="1999443"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Viktor-Rolf/Flowerbomb-1460.html?ccid=1999443#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1995082" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1995082" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="amaramarie0208"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1917224"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="amaramarie0208" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1995082ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1995082" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1917224">amaramarie0208</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-07">12/07/23 10:32</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is very sweet, mixed with some citrus giving it a rather fresh, zingy scent. It's personally too sour for my taste, meaning its floral notes are a little too underlying by the overly powerful sharp tang. This sour taste is also the reason I don't find the perfume very elegant or mature, it's very much an adolescent fragrance, with an abundance of chemical-smelling notes. I wouldn't recommend this for anyone looking for a more developed scent, but I suppose it works for a teen looking for a very fresh, citrusy perfume with overlooked floral notes.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="1460"comment_id="1995082"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Viktor-Rolf/Flowerbomb-1460.html?ccid=1995082#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1993359" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; It smells slightly sweeter than it did before.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="1460"comment_id="1993050"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Viktor-Rolf/Flowerbomb-1460.html?ccid=1993050#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1990255" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1990255" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="rose4franc"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1830492"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1830492.gif" class="comments-avatar"alt="rose4franc" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1990255ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1990255" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1830492">rose4franc</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-01">12/01/23 21:08</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A delicate rosy musk. The tea note turns sweet almost like lychee. It doesn't project at all like an EDP but more like an EDT. The prominent fruit note (orange flower) takes center stage but a synthetic orchid sweetness makes it a little jammy. Something ominous about it. Like if I walked into a big open room with nobody there but just this flowerbomb ambience spread out I'd get this haunted nostalgic feeling creep upon me.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="1460"comment_id="1990255"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Viktor-Rolf/Flowerbomb-1460.html?ccid=1990255#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1989988" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1989988" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Makeup Discourse"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1745583"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1745583.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Makeup Discourse" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Yves-Saint-Laurent/Libre-Flowers-Flames-95623.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.95623.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Libre Flowers & Flames"title="Libre Flowers & Flames"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1989988ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1989988" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1745583">Makeup Discourse</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-01">12/01/23 13:02</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I love this and I don't know why! <br />
<br />
As this was compared to LVEB, I decided to not even look at it. But I succumbed to the allure and took a whiff of this in the perfume aisle and sprayed on my pulse points. To my delight, it was not at all like LVEB, not sweet at all, and it was the reason I had to get a full bottle! This is nothing like LVEB.<br />
On me it is a floral patchouli symphony (sans the sweetness). Absolute Love!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="1460"comment_id="1989988"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Viktor-Rolf/Flowerbomb-1460.html?ccid=1989988#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1988838" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1988838" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="manateemuse"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1811714"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1811714.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="manateemuse" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Maison-Martin-Margiela/Under-The-Lemon-Tree-53379.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.53379.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Under The Lemon Tree"title="Under The Lemon Tree"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1988838ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1988838" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1811714">manateemuse</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-11-30">11/30/23 05:58</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Floral scents are not my favorite, but this is not purely a floral. Neither is it a heavy patchouli that smells like your local metaphysical shop. The two notes are both extremely powerful within this perfume, creating a scent that reminds me a lot of floral pastries. The patchouli smells more like a doughy vanilla scent when combined with the floral notes, which are themselves slightly diluted by the base notes. This is still an overwhelmingly powerful perfume, and will stick to your clothes for days after. You are best off walking through this scent rather than spraying it on directly. I imagine the woman who owns this perfume would regularly wear it to springtime afternoon teas.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="1460"comment_id="1988838"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Viktor-Rolf/Flowerbomb-1460.html?ccid=1988838#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1985457" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1985457" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="sennie"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1901378"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1901378.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="sennie" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1985457ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1985457" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1901378">sennie</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-11-26">11/26/23 00:33</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>very feminine, and soft; it is sweet and smells of mainly florals, unsurprisingly.<br />
i don't think it is overly so, but i don't find this to be very special either.<br />
at first, i thought it was pretty -- which it is -- but it also is a bit generic.<br />
i imagine you can definitely find something similar to this at bath and body works, or even victoria's secret.<br />
you could wear this daily any time, any season, any occasion because it's that inoffensive and safe.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="1460"comment_id="1985457"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Viktor-Rolf/Flowerbomb-1460.html?ccid=1985457#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1981234" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; I am no stranger to patchouli scents, but something about this just smelt like bitter plastic. It is incredibly long lasting though, sprayed it on my jacket and the scent is still there weeks later...too bad It's awful.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="1460"comment_id="1981234"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Viktor-Rolf/Flowerbomb-1460.html?ccid=1981234#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1981065" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1863420">Biggest.Nose</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-11-20">11/20/23 11:22</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is a nice scent, very long-lasting.<br />
However, unfortunately for me when it's first applied to my skin it smells like a hairspray. Not unpleasant but cheap hairspray... <br />
It then an hour later changes to a white floral mist smell; which is sweet and nice.<br />
Then unfortunately it smells sweet and metallic almost like coins 3 hours into wearing it.<br />
I've tried this a few times. It's lovely I would wear it but for me it's not worth the price.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="1460"comment_id="1981065"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Viktor-Rolf/Flowerbomb-1460.html?ccid=1981065#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1980764" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1974952" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="dschwend"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1563867"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1563867.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="dschwend" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1974952ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1974952" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1563867">dschwend</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-11-12">11/12/23 11:44</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Ive loved this scent for many years, but over the past 5 Ive felt less drawn to it, and increasingly that I associate it with my early-mid twenties. Recently a friend commented that she really like the tea note in this fragrance, and Ill admit, the tea aspect never really stood out to me prior. I decided to smell collect all my tea note fragrances together and tried mixing this with commodity gold (expressive). The mix definitely reminded me of a London Fog latte without leaning heavily into the tea note. More like youve brewed and Earl Grey tea, but havent yet taken a sip. And youve grabbed some sugar cookie biscuits to have along with it. The combo is a 3 pm tea time well suited for cooler weather (perhaps not a dead of winter type). If you have both I highly recommend mixing them to breathe new life into V&amp;Rfb.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="1460"comment_id="1974952"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Viktor-Rolf/Flowerbomb-1460.html?ccid=1974952#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1972581" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1972581" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="mermaidshimmer"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/51247"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.51247.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="mermaidshimmer" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Van-Cleef-Arpels/Orchidee-Vanille-6463.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.6463.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Orchidee Vanille"title="Orchidee Vanille"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1972581ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1972581" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/51247">mermaidshimmer</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-11-09">11/09/23 11:24</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I like to sweeten this perfume my pairing it with Flowerbomb Twist Rose Oil. Yet, even with this combo, this fragrance sticks close to the skin. It has a quiet throw, so people wont detect it unless theyre right beside you, in your personal space. I get wafts of it all day. The warm, spicy florals are pleasant. But theres very little projection or drama. A cozy scent </p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="1460"comment_id="1972581"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Viktor-Rolf/Flowerbomb-1460.html?ccid=1972581#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1972007" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
